Text: Re ISDA Cc Regarding the proposed deal the attached file describes the terms agreed upon with Duke similar structure than C Puertos swap except that now Enron sells Duke buys Dukes trader with whom I have been talking to is Amy Statler located in their BsAs office After reading the email below sent by Erik Ludtke from Duke in which he mentions ISDA agreement partially executed by ECT and later requests the confirmation letter I still have my doubts on what Confirmation Letter hes talking about I think hes referring to the receipt letter for the ISDA document they sent and not the Confirm of this particular deal Prior to this Confirm we would need an ECT trader to get on the phone with Duke and execute the deal Let me know what you think and the outcome of your conversation with Roni Cappadonna Thanks Julian To Julian PooleENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Don BlackENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Federico CerisoliENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Brent HendryENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Sara CT Dale CT cc Subject Re ISDA So far as much as Ive been able to track the Houston Confirmation Desk does not know about this Duke Confirm yet Don can you contact Dale Neuner on the Confirmation Desk ASAP with the proposed deal terms so he can prepare the Confirm and get it sent over to Duke Thanks Forwarded by Tana JonesHOUECT on PM From Julian PooleENRONDEVELOPMENT AT ENRON CMAIL on PM To Tana CT cc Sara CT Federico Cerisoli AT ENRON CMAIL Don BlackENRONDEVELOPMENT AT ENRON CMAIL Brent Hendry AT ENRON CMAIL Subject Re ISDA Tana do you know whats the Confirmation Letter Duke is talking about in the email below They are requesting us to send it to them Julian Forwarded by Julian PooleENRONDEVELOPMENT on Federico Cerisoli To Erik Ludtke cc Roni A Cappadonna Alejandro Felices Don BlackENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Sara NRONDEVELOPMENT Brent HendryENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Julian PooleENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Subject Re ISDA Good I hope this is the first of a number of transactions we enter into together Please have your people sending the ISDA back to our lawyers in Houston with Dukes signature so we then complete the loop Julian would you please coordinate asap with our Houston staff to have them sending the confirmation to Roni at the fax number below Thanks Erik Ludtke on AM To Federico CerisoliENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Carol F Graebner Amy J Statler Roni A Cappadonna Alejandro Felices Maria Zocchi Subject ISDA We are in receipt of the ISDA agreement partially executed by ECT We would like for ECT to send the confirmation letter to Roni Cappadonna in Houston at The fax number is
